template.name: Software Report By Software Name (csv)
template.template_variables:
data_sources:
  agentsSoftware: 
    model: installedsoftware
    select_related:
      - agent
      - agent__site
      - agent__site__client
    only:
      - software
      - agent__agent_id
      - agent__hostname
      - agent__site__name
      - agent__site__client__name
    order_by:
      - agent__site__client__name
      - agent__site
